message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product, given its value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $850,000 undervalues the product significantly. I could consider coming down to $900,000. This offer still reflects the true value of what I'm offering.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $875,000. This is my final offer.
